name: HL7 Version 2 Model Elements
title: HL7 Version 2 Model Elements
description:
This code system defines HL7 Version 2 Model Elements used for Version 2 to FHIR Translation
This subset addresses model elements used for conversion of V2-FHIR Mapping - Datatype: CP
Source data can be found at https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=37388301

property.description: High value for cardinality, set to 2147483647 if unbounded
The V2 Datatype assigned to this model element

concept.code: There doesn't seem to be a single data type that includes all the concepts in CP The Money amount may also be represented as a Quantity, using the MoneyQuantity constraint sqty-1 Presumably the mappings would be Quantity
Straw Recommendation: Deprecate from V2, do not map to FHIR in this context
the code data doesn't give all the data elements as CWE the type of unit would be represented in both the low and high range elements
